products.description: OPPO Find X2 has a massive 6.7-inch FHD+ OLED display, having a pixel density of 519ppi and a screen resolution of 1440 x 3168 pixels for a great cinematic experience. The smartphone has an aspect ratio of 19.8:9 and a refresh rate of 120Hz.

Discover new possibilities and enjoy the mind-blowing performance with the innovative Oppo Reno8 smartphone, which is loaded with impressive features. This phone features Dual Sony Sensors on the front and back of the phone, allowing you to create captivating images with beautiful visuals. Furthermore, the slim form of this phone, which has a thickness of 7.67 mm and weighs roughly 179 g, allows you to create a fashion statement that draws the attention of onlookers. Furthermore, you can enjoy smooth operation and an exquisite user experience owing to the fantastic MediaTek Dimensity 1300 with a magnificent 6 nm architecture.

The Oppo Reno6 Pro Blue is a device with Android, that has a screen with a 2400x1080 pixel resolution. The phone contains 256000 MB storage space and has a 12288 MB working memory. The back contains a good-quality camera that allows you to take great pictures. The Oppo Reno6 Pro Blue is compatible with 5G. The phone is also capable of connecting to Bluetooth version 5.2. Futhermore, the phone has a Splash resistant (IP-X4) certificate.
Oppo Reno 7 5G · Display 6.40-inch (1080x2400) · Processor MediaTek Dimensity 900 · Front Camera 32MP · Rear Camera 64MP + 8MP + 2MP · RAM 8GB · Storage 128GB, 256GB.

products.description: OPPO F21s Pro 5G is equipped with an AMOLED type, 6.43-inches display built with a high-pixel density of 409ppi and a resolution of 2400 x 1080 pixels. The aspect ratio and refresh rate of this display are 20:9 and 60Hz, respectively and it also comes with an Eye Care feature.

With its 440g of weight and 6.94 mm of thickness OPPO Pad Air is so light and thin that you will feel as if you don't have it with you. In addition, the combination of exclusive materials and the proprietary OPPO Glow workmanship have made the rear shell of OPPO Pad Air resistant to accidental scratches and fingerprints. Thanks to its design, with a rounded shape, it guarantees a firm and comfortable grip, you can take notes by writing freehand for an even faster experience.
OPPO Pencil Stylus is equipped with advanced 4096-layer pressure sensitivity, enabling you to naturally jot down notes and write memos with full responsiveness.
